short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check your opponents' ratings, common openings, and past accuracies to get to cheaters before they get to you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Checks, Captures, Threats—three essential elements in chess to consider before making your move. But in today’s day and age, what's a greater threat than cheaters? 

Gain the upper hand on cheaters with this Chrome extension! Instantly analyze your opponents' ratings, favorite openings, and past game accuracy. Arm yourself with critical insights to identify cheaters and enhance your strategy, all before the first pawn moves. Elevate your play and stay steps ahead of the competition. 

Make every move count with our essential chess companion!
